amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to be used for the Innovative Science Learning Center of Science South, Florence, South Carolina, and to decrease the appropriations for the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration cross agency support by $500,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 86 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used for the Innovative Science Learning Center of Science South, Florence, South Carolina, and decrease the appropriations for the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration cross agency support by $500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 107 - 320 (Roll no. 379).
